verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: negro bar] [ARG2: an offensive park name] a new petition effort says it is a petition calling for folsom negro bar recreation area to be renamed is gaining traction online arguing that the current race - related name is out - of - date and offensive the petition was initially created in september by stockton resident phaedra jones after she saw a sign for the park while driving through folsom it has more than 3 800 signatures as of about 2 p m wednesday i was so confused shocked angry putdown sad hurt disrespected and in disbelief i could n't believe that i had actually seen a sign that read negro bar jones wrote in her utah u s park folsom sacramento african american historical and cultural society president kcra us board of geographic names american river washington phaedra jones california state parks lake natoma american river negro bill canyon negro bar recreation area u s board of geographic names william grandstaff canyon
